question: In which North-Eastern region of Nigeria a terrible attack on farm workers took place?
explanation: The attack on farm workers in the North-Eastern region of Nigeria has left at least 110 dead. The Boko Haram Jihadists are blamed for the killing. The attack took place near the Borno state capital Maiduguri in Nigeria. The rise of Boko Haram is mainly due to the failure of Nigerian government to improve economic conditions of people in the region.
